wc = rws.getRobWorkStudio():getWorkCell()
state = wc:getDefaultState()
device = wc:findDevice("KukaKr16")
gripper = wc:findFrame("Tool");
bottle = wc:findFrame("Bottle");
table = wc:findFrame("Table");

function setQ(q)
qq = rw.Q(#q,q[1],q[2],q[3],q[4],q[5],q[6])
device:setQ(qq,state)
rws.getRobWorkStudio():setState(state)
rw.sleep(0.1)
end

function attach(obj, tool)
rw.gripFrame(obj, tool, state)
rws.getRobWorkStudio():setState(state)
rw.sleep(0.1)
end


setQ({-3.142, -0.827, -3.002, -3.143, 0.099, -1.573})
attach(bottle,gripper)


setQ({-3.142, -0.827, -3.002, -3.143, 0.099, -1.573})
setQ({-2.74897, -0.752849, -2.92878, -3.29959, -0.00711481, -1.35189})
setQ({-2.76843, -0.608638, -3.0836, -3.58204, 0.338136, -1.42856})
setQ({-2.557, -0.560194, -3.10035, -3.92542, 0.4219, -1.70739})
setQ({-2.31656, -0.561528, -2.71316, -4.09366, 0.369859, -1.60124})
setQ({-2.11608, -0.536054, -2.43396, -4.21877, 0.308048, -1.9355})
setQ({-1.94652, -0.499993, -2.29883, -3.82953, 0.253012, -1.86453})
setQ({-1.76058, -0.460448, -2.15065, -3.40268, 0.192658, -1.7867})
setQ({-1.57464, -0.420902, -2.00246, -2.97583, 0.132303, -1.70886})

setQ({-0.611238, -0.260847, -1.85038, -0.963115, 0.175133, -0.156923})
setQ({-0.330848, -0.215642, -1.69008, -0.62271, 0.153946, 0.00836327})
setQ({-0.0504585, -0.170437, -1.52979, -0.282305, 0.132759, 0.17365})
setQ({0.229931, -0.125231, -1.3695, 0.0580999, 0.111572, 0.338936})
setQ({0.510321, -0.0800258, -1.2092, 0.398505, 0.090385, 0.504223})

setQ({0.986277, -0.00914703, -1.01732, 1.18569, 0.160785, 1.48027})
setQ({0.943181, -0.0457189, -0.890866, 1.49204, 0.246464, 1.84031})
setQ({0.897212, -0.0285526, -0.992764, 1.23136, 0.38938, 2.22609})
setQ({1.02911, -0.0605815, -0.901529, 0.838822, 0.573303, 2.41408})
setQ({0.973166, -0.203435, -0.511169, 0.83602, 0.583813, 2.68605})
setQ({1.02777, -0.226269, -0.600249, 0.471085, 0.678962, 2.99642})
setQ({0.853322, -0.165132, -0.526269, 0.0319058, 0.644307, 3.124})
setQ({0.787036, -0.129014, -0.486879, -0.342591, 0.67278, 3.44289})
setQ({1.04836, -0.084009, -0.314586, -0.177394, 0.70252, 3.79193})
setQ({1.30968, -0.0390045, -0.142293, -0.012197, 0.73226, 4.14096})
setQ({1.571, 0.006, 0.03, 0.153, 0.762, 4.49})

attach(bottle,table)
setQ({1.571, 0.006, 0.03, 0.153, 0.762, 4.49})
